entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
Applicants are expected to hold A-level Biology or a Science related subject at Grade C or above. Please consult with our Counsellor for further guidance.  Applicants must also have a minimum of five GCSEs at grade 4/C or above including English, Maths and Science.
Applicants who do not hold these qualifications may be considered on an individual basis based upon their overall application and the course applied for.
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
5 subjects at B5 level. Applicants are expected to hold A-level Biology or a Science related subject at Grade C or above.  Applicants must also have a minimum of five GCSEs at grade 4/C or above including English, Maths and Science.
Applicants who do not hold these qualifications may be considered on an individual basis based upon their overall application and the course applied for.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
Applicants are expected to hold A-level Biology or a Science related subject at Grade C or above. Please consult with our Counsellor for further guidance.  Applicants must also have a minimum of five GCSEs at grade 4/C or above including English, Maths and Science.
Applicants who do not hold these qualifications may be considered on an individual basis based upon their overall application and the course applied for.
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma:
28 points. Applicants are expected to hold A-level Biology or a Science related subject at Grade C or above..  Applicants must also have a minimum of five GCSEs at grade 4/C or above including English, Maths and Science.
Applicants who do not hold these qualifications may be considered on an individual basis based upon their overall application and the course applied for.
